item.name: XMLFlight_Argument_0
item.value: Please, choose one of the Charter Options :

item.name: XMLFlight_Argument_1
item.value: (*) You DO intend to sell seats to the general public. (**) You DO NOT intend to sell seats to the general public.

item.name: XMLFlight_Argument_2
item.value: Please Note: For Public Charters, the aircrafts are generally configured to carry from 17 to around 400 passengers. For an specific aircraft configuration, please provide more details about your charter needs.

item.name: XMLFlight_Argument_3
item.value: For 'Multi-City' Trips, please use the 'Remarks Field' to provide the information about the additional Departure and Arrival Cities, as well as the Departure Dates and Times for each LEG not listed before.

item.name: XMLFlight_Catering_Service_2
item.value: Athletic Portions (1.5 to 2 X Standard Service)

item.name: XMLFlight_Charter_Name
item.value: Charter Group Name (Identify the Charter Flight) :
